Detailed Description

A generalised, simple, singleton application class containing logging and event managment.

Singleton pattern taken from post on Stackoverflow.com by "modi"
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/42558/python-and-the-singleton-pattern/1810367#1810367
Accessed: 9th March 2010

def pnm.singletonApp.SingletonApp.close (   self  ) 

Safe shutdown and dereference of variables.

This stops circular references stopping the garbage collection
